channel.title: Blight Disease on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Blight Disease on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaMYB39
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaMYB39 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB-SG7 transcription factor Genome: Species: Cicer arietinum Functional Descriptions: The R2R3-MYB-SG7 transcription factor CaMYB39 orchestrates surface phenylpropanoid metabolism and pathogen resistance in chickpea.

item.title: Gsb
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO03C012987 Gene Symbol: Gsb Gene Name: Gummy stem blight Genome: Melon (DHL92) v3.

item.title: HvWIN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvWIN1 Gene Name: WAX INDUCER1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: WAX INDUCER1 (HvWIN1) transcription factor regulates free fatty acid biosynthetic genes to reinforce cuticle to resist Fusarium head blight in barley spikelets.

item.title: MdDIPM4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdDIPM4 Gene Name: Malus domestica DspA/E-interacting proteins of M.

item.title: MeHB16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MeHB16 Gene Name: homeodomain leucine-zipper I (HD-Zip I) TF Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: KIN10-mediated HB16 protein phosphorylation and self-association improve cassava disease resistance by transcriptional activation of lignin biosynthesis genes.

item.title: MeKIN10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MeKIN10 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: KIN10-mediated HB16 protein phosphorylation and self-association improve cassava disease resistance by transcriptional activation of lignin biosynthesis genes.

item.title: MeNF-YC15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MeNF-YC15 Gene Name: nuclear factor Y Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: NF-YC15 transcription factor activates ethylene biosynthesis and improves cassava disease resistance.

item.title: StERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StERF3 Gene Name: ERF-associated amphiphilic repression Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: The Potato ERF Transcription Factor StERF3 Negatively Regulates Resistance to Phytophthora infestans and Salt Tolerance in Potato.

item.title: TaCPK2-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCPK2-A Gene Name: calcium-dependent protein kinase 2 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaCPK2-A, a calcium-dependent protein kinase gene that is required for wheat powdery mildew resistance enhances bacterial blight resistance in transgenic rice.
